title: Initialize Next.js Repository & Tooling
description: Scaffold Next.js App Router project. Configure TypeScript strict mode, ESLint, Prettier, and Husky hooks. Install and configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui base components.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Build pipeline passes without errors; Linting rules enforced on commit

title: Design & Implement Multi-Tenant Prisma Schema
description: Define PostgreSQL schema for Users, Merchants, and Roles using UUIDs. Implement connection pooling configuration (PgBouncer) to mitigate serverless connection exhaustion risks.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Schema compiles and migrations run locally; Indexes defined on merchantId; Connection pooling configured
definition_of_done: Migration files created; Connection pooling active

title: Implement JWT Authentication Service
description: Develop AuthService for registration and login. Implement Argon2 password hashing, RS256 JWT signing, and secure HttpOnly cookie management for refresh tokens.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: User registration stores hashed password; Login issues valid Access/Refresh tokens; Refresh tokens stored in HttpOnly cookies

title: Implement Salla OAuth Code Exchange
description: Create API routes for OAuth redirect and callback. Implement state parameter validation for CSRF protection. Exchange authorization code for tokens and encrypt (AES-256) before DB storage.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: OAuth flow redirects correctly; State parameter validated; Tokens encrypted at rest
definition_of_done: OAuth routes functional; Integration tests passing
business_value: Enables data access from merchant stores

title: Implement Salla Webhook Verification & Queuing
description: Create webhook endpoint to validate HMAC signatures. Push valid events to QStash for asynchronous processing to ensure <200ms response time.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: HMAC signature validation works; Events pushed to QStash; Endpoint responds <200ms
definition_of_done: Webhook handler deployed; Mock tests passing

title: Architect Recursive Data Sync Worker
description: Implement historical sync worker using recursive QStash pattern to bypass serverless timeouts. Each function invocation processes one page of Salla API results.
sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Worker processes single page within limits; Next page event triggered; State persisted to DB
definition_of_done: Recursive worker functional; Load tests passing

title: Design & Deploy ClickHouse OLAP Schema
description: Define MergeTree tables for SalesFact and OrderItems. Configure partition keys (YYYYMM) and sorting keys (MerchantID, Date) for query performance.
sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Schema successfully deployed; Test queries execute <100ms

title: Implement CDC Pipeline Consumer
description: Develop QStash consumer to process batch change events from Postgres. Transform data and insert into ClickHouse using de-duplication logic.
sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Data flows from Postgres to ClickHouse; Latency under 5 minutes; Duplicates handled
definition_of_done: CDC Worker active; Data consistency verified

title: Develop Analytics Aggregation API
description: Create API endpoints to query ClickHouse for Dashboard KPIs. Implement parameterized SQL generation with strict merchantId scoping.
sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Endpoints return correct JSON; SQL injection protection verified; Response time <200ms

title: Implement Recharts Dashboard Components
description: Build responsive Chart components using Recharts (Line, Bar, Area). Integrate with Analytics API. Implement loading skeletons and error states.
sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Charts render data from API; Responsive on mobile; Loading states implemented

title: Develop Sync Progress Polling Component
description: Build React component to poll sync status endpoint. Visualize progress percentage and current stage. Handle 'Completed' and 'Failed' states gracefully.
sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Polls status every 5s; Displays progress bar; Handles error states

title: Implement Rich Text Email Editor
description: Integrate TipTap editor with custom extensions for dynamic variables. Implement HTML sanitization on save. Build template management UI.
sprint_goal: Deliver value via Abandoned Cart Recovery automation tools
acceptance_criteria: Generates valid HTML; Dynamic variables work; Sanitizes malicious inputs
definition_of_done: Editor component reusable; XSS tests passing

title: Implement Cart Abandonment Scheduler
description: Create background job to detect abandoned carts (>1h inactive). Schedule recovery email sequences via QStash. Implement logic to cancel scheduled emails if purchase occurs.
sprint_goal: Deliver value via Abandoned Cart Recovery automation tools
acceptance_criteria: Correctly identifies abandoned carts; Schedules future email jobs; Cancels jobs on conversion

title: Setup pgvector & Embedding Service
description: Enable pgvector extension. Implement service to batch generate embeddings for product catalog using OpenAI and store in Postgres.
sprint_goal: Deliver value via Abandoned Cart Recovery automation tools
acceptance_criteria: Vector search returns relevant results; Batch processing works without timeouts
definition_of_done: Embedding service deployed; Vector search functional

title: Develop Secure NL-to-SQL AI Service
description: Implement RAG service to convert user questions to ClickHouse SQL. Implement strict SQL parser middleware to enforce tenant isolation and prevent data leakage.
sprint_goal: Implement advanced AI capabilities and forecasting features
acceptance_criteria: Generated SQL is valid; SQL execution strictly scoped to merchantId; Prompt injection attempts blocked
definition_of_done: AI Service deployed; Penetration tests passed
deployment_notes: Strict firewall rules for DB access
